description: Square in middle, possibly with horizontal lines across, and lines coming from top and bottom

features.description: How is the top extended? 0 = inverted U, 1 = vertical line
How is the bottom extended? 0 = two greater-than symbol legs, 1 = vertical line, 2 = nothing
How is the middle decorated? 0 = empty, 1 = as a grid, 2 = with partial horizontal lines
